mapper.insert: MERGE INTO PERSON p USING (SELECT #{personId} AS person_id FROM DUAL) src ON (p.person_id = src.person_id) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET p.person_name = #{personName}, p.biography = #{biography}, p.profile_path = #{profilePath} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (person_id, person_name, biography, profile_path) VALUES (#{personId}, #{personName}, #{biography}, #{profilePath})
